Comments

Clients Says

AMALA PAUL @amalapaul

Good hotel serving Quality Food. Tasty Food and Service was really wonderful. Especially a server named Sathish, Polite, Calm, Respectful and Fast in response. If you want to have good food...This the the best and my first choice.

MOHAN LAL @mohanlal

serves good vegetarian dishes and in fact there are only few vegetarian restaurants and Sri Nivas is one of the best. The Ghee roast and Masala dosa are fresh and crispy and tasted great with sambar and chutney. The restaurant was moderately crowded when we went there and the restaurant was well maintained and clean. The vegetarian dishes are prepared in the traditional style and better than what we have in the vegetarian restaurants in the cities. The staff were also giving good attention to each guests.

PRITHVIRAJ @Prithviraj

Awesome food. We went here for Breakfast and the food was awesome. Great taste and not expensive. Worth the money spent

SHINE TOM @shinetom

Great spot for a very inexpensive meal which is popular with the locals. Food was some of the best we have had in India and staff were extremely friendly and courteous. Definitely worth a visit
